constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 140 (Tuesday, August 30, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CLOUD:
H.R. 8754.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution
[Page H7731]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Dismantling Investments in Violation of Ethical Standards through Trusts Act
